    Define which drivers/technologies can be used for communicating this reactor system from another It's like the local driver, but for communications with other reactor systems

  • Method Details

    • setReactorSystemName

      public ReActorSystemConfig.Builder setReactorSystemName​(java.lang.String reactorSystemName)
      Parameters:
      reactorSystemName - Must be unique in the cluster

    • setMsgFanOutPoolSize

      public ReActorSystemConfig.Builder setMsgFanOutPoolSize​(int msgFanOutPoolSize)
      Message fan out to passive subscribers use a dedicated thread pool. This specifies how bit it is
      Parameters:
      msgFanOutPoolSize - numbers of threads that should be used. Range 1 - 200

    • setRecordExecution

      public ReActorSystemConfig.Builder setRecordExecution​(boolean shallRecordExecution)
      Enable logs for cold replay. These logs are going to be generated as system messages, so they must be recorded using a suitable local driver
      Parameters:
      shallRecordExecution - true if data for cold replay should be generated during execution.

    • setLocalDriver

      public ReActorSystemConfig.Builder setLocalDriver​(LocalDriver localDriver)
      Defining how messages should be exchanged within a reactor system may be useful for profiling, debugging, post mortem analysis or logs replay. This parameter allows to choose how messages should be physically transmitted from the source to the target mailbox within this reactor system
      Parameters:
      localDriver - driver that should be used for communication within this reactor system

    • addDispatcherConfig

      public ReActorSystemConfig.Builder addDispatcherConfig​(DispatcherConfig dispatcherConfig)
      Parameters:
      dispatcherConfig - new dispatcher config

    • addRemotingDriver

      public ReActorSystemConfig.Builder addRemotingDriver​(RemotingDriver remotingDriver)
      Define which drivers/technologies can be used for communicating this reactor system from another It's like the local driver, but for communications with other reactor systems
      Parameters:
      remotingDriver - remoting driver

    • addServiceRegistryDriver

      public ReActorSystemConfig.Builder addServiceRegistryDriver​(ServiceRegistryDriver serviceRegistryDriver)
      Connect the reactor system to the service registries instance specified by these drivers
      Parameters:
      serviceRegistryDriver - service registry driver

    • build

      public ReActorSystemConfig build()
